ISSUE.TITLE: Fix `cassandra-topology.properties` removal
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Commit https://github.com/k8ssandra/management-api-for-apache-cassandra/commit/1c79885cec838bfedc73b802f7b63ec6f3c7de0c attempted to remove the topology file from the images by doing so in the entrypoint script. This seems to fail due to ownership/permissions issues in some environments (at least in K8s with cass-operator). We should put the file removal in the Dockerfiles themselves instead of the entrypoint script.
